des:
MTronic Smart Building integrates with Alexa to bring convenience of building automation at your fingertips! 
Now you, or anyone in your home, can tell Alexa to turn on the lights for you or adjust the speed of the fan according to your liking. Ask Alexa to set the level of blinds on your windows to that of your choice. You can now ask Alexa to set a certain scene ON for you on a single voice command, while you sit back and enjoy your cup of tea on your couch! 
To get started, select the 'Enable Skill' button in the Alexa App to link your MTronic Smart Building account and discover your devices. Find more information about connecting smart home devices at Connect a Smart Home Device to Alexa (http://tinyurl.com/alexa-smart-home).

To use the skill, you need established names for your devices. There are two ways to define these names:

1.Use the names you previously set up. They are shown in the MTronic Smart Building app and can be changed.
2.Create an Alexa group, like Bedroom or Downstairs, and add the device to the group. More information is available at Create a Smart Home Device Group (http://tinyurl.com/alexa-smart-home-groups)
3.After you know the name or group name for your devices, you can say the following:
• "Alexa, turn on the Bedroom Fan."
• "Alexa, set blinds to 5."
• “Alexa, turn on the Bed Side Lights”.
• “Alexa, turn on Evening.”
• “Alexa, turn on Morning”.
• “Alexa, set blinds to 10”.
• “Alexa, set fan speed to max”.
• “Alexa, dim the Headboard light”.
